page.title: 09Longfield Middle School
page.content: Longfield Middle School has existed for four years;it was created in 1981 when education in the Longfield area was reorganised. Children transfer to the school at 9+ and leave at 13+. The school has 530 boys and girls who are organised into four year groups. There are 29 members of staff,including a Headteacher and two Deputy Heads. Each Year Group has a Leader and a Deputy Leader. Each subject area has a Head of Department. Subjects taught include: English; Mathematics; Science; French; Computer Studies; Physical Education and Games; Humanities (Geography and History); Studio (Food and Textiles, Printing and Graphics, Art and Ceramics, Craft Design Technology); Religious Education; Music.
